t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    length = 1
    for i in range(1, n):
        length += a[i] != a[i - 1]
    for i in range(q):
        (x, y) = map(int, input().split())
        x = x - 1
        if x != 0:
            length -= a[x] != a[x - 1]
            length += y != a[x - 1]
        if x != n - 1:
            length -= a[x] != a[x + 1]
            length += y != a[x + 1]
        a[x] = y
        print(length)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, q) = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    total = 1
    for i in range(1, n):
        total += arr[i] != arr[i - 1]
    for i in range(q):
        (x, y) = list(map(int, input().split()))
        x = x - 1
        if x != 0:
            total -= arr[x - 1] != arr[x]
            total += arr[x - 1] != y
        if x != n - 1:
            total -= arr[x + 1] != arr[x]
            total += arr[x + 1] != y
        arr[x] = y
        print(total)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (N, Q) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    count = 1
    for i in range(N - 1):
        count += arr[i] != arr[i + 1]
    for q in range(Q):
        (x, y) = map(int, input().split())
        x -= 1
        if x != 0:
            count -= arr[x] != arr[x - 1]
            count += y != arr[x - 1]
        if x != N - 1:
            count -= arr[x] != arr[x + 1]
            count += y != arr[x + 1]
        arr[x] = y
        print(count)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split())
    len = 1
    l = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))[:n]
    for i in range(1, n):
        len += l[i] != l[i - 1]
    for i in range(q):
        (x, y) = map(int, input().split())
        x = x - 1
        if x != 0:
            len -= l[x] != l[x - 1]
            len += y != l[x - 1]
        if x != n - 1:
            len -= l[x] != l[x + 1]
            len += y != l[x + 1]
        l[x] = y
        print(len)
    l.clear()
